name: Student of Life
description:
Philippians 4:9 What you have learned and received and heard and seen in me–practice these things and the God of peace will be with you.” We have been given the philosophy of live and learn but how can you truly live until you have learned? 

Class is in Session, Shane Kidd takes you to school featuring Classmates k-Drama, Dillon Chase, Sho Baraka and more

1. Student of Life

2. Son Light

3. Escape (Skipping Out)

4. Groundwork 101 Feat. Emajinthis and Muche

5. Hallway Journeys Feat. k-Drama

6. Build Up Feat. Dillon Chase

7. Sweet Temptation Feat. Emajinthis

8. Psalm 98

9. Life to Legacy Feat. Sho Baraka

10. Introspective

11. Study Break

12. Straight Fire

13. Beautiful Love Feat. Diamone

14. Learn to Live Feat. Fitzgerald
